creditline: Gift of Jack A. and Aviva Robinson
description: Pieced, printed lining (also forms edge finish). Red wool ground with polychrome silk and synthetic embroidery. The printed cotton backing is turned to the front along the edges to form a self-binding. Chain stitch outlining with back stitch fill.
medium: Silk, wool, cotton; chain stitch, slanted buttonhole stitch
title: At torba ilgich
